translations.chinese: 東如咸陽，引兵圍雍王廢丘，而遣諸將略地。
translations.english: He went east to Xianyang, led troops to surround King Yong at Feiqiu, and sent various generals to seize territory.

translations.chinese: 田榮聞羽徙齊王市於膠東而立田都為齊王，大怒，以齊兵迎擊田都。
translations.english: Tian Rong heard that Xiang Yu had moved King Qi Tian Shi to Jiaodong and established Tian Du as King of Qi. He was greatly angered and led Qi troops to attack Tian Du.
Tian Du fled and surrendered to Chu.

translations.chinese: 六月，田榮殺田市，自立 為齊王。
translations.english: In the sixth month, Tian Rong killed Tian Shi and established himself as King of Qi.

translations.chinese: 時彭城在鉅野，眾萬餘人，無所屬。
translations.english: At this time Peng Yue was at Juye with over 10,000 followers, belonging to no one.
